# isLoadingComplete(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called to check if the tab has finished loading.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func isLoadingComplete(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView/isLoading] of the tab’s web view if not implemented.
title: isLoadingComplete(for:)
